metadata.synopsis: Animation timeline of a gnome picking sword from a rack.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Go to larian://bookmark?mod=GustavDev&level=BGO_Main_A&camPos=-247.619934;3.765666;-1069.583252&camTarget=-247.765961;3.341375;-1068.689575Use ReCon command `oe wyr_iron_skipscene`Wait for the gnome to start its behavior.
